metadata.title: CVE-2023-21400 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: In multiple functions of io_uring.c, there is a possible kernel memorycorruption due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege in the kernel with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
